channel.title: Tops on Chace's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Tops on Chace's Blog

item.description: Chushi(Chace) Shi, is a Master student in the Department of Statistics at the University of Wisconsin-Madison, and research on Causal Inference under the supervision of Prof. Hyunseung Kang. My father gives me the name, Chushi, because “Chu” in Chinese means Hubei Province, and “Shi” is my Chinese nick name “Shitou”(as Stone in English). By the way, my father's pseudonym was also “Chushi” when he was young. It is so meaningful and interesting!
Machine learning学习笔记 Coursera 在线课程 Machine learning 笔记讲师: 吴恩达(Andrew Ng) 课程地址：https://www.
